dcterms:creator: K. He
X. Zhang
S. Ren
J. Sun
dcterms:description: A dataset used for assessing the opacity of colorectal organoids from brightfield images, containing examples of opaque and transparent organoids.
dcterms:title: Opacity Dataset

dcterms:creator: F. Chollet
dcterms:description: A dataset used for assessing the budding feature of colorectal organoids from brightfield images, containing examples of budding and non-budding organoids.
dcterms:title: Budding Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Szegedy
S. Ioffe
V. Vanhoucke
A. A. Alemi
dcterms:description: A training dataset used for both opacity and budding features, containing images of organoids sorted into categories.
dcterms:title: Training Dataset (for both opacity and budding)

dcterms:creator: K. Simonyan
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: A test dataset used for both opacity and budding features, containing images of organoids for validation of the model.
dcterms:title: Test Dataset (for both opacity and budding)

dcterms:description: A validation dataset used for both opacity and budding features, containing images of organoids for model validation.
dcterms:title: Validation Dataset (for both opacity and budding)

dcterms:creator: J. F. Dekkers
C. L. Wiegerinck

dcterms:description: A full training dataset that is publicly accessible, containing images of organoids for training deep learning models.
dcterms:title: Full Training Dataset (publicly accessible)
